name: Virtual Family: Mom Dream Home
description:
Welcome to virtual mom simulator : happy virtual family game. Real virtual mother simulator is there with all the real features you needed. Become happy family member and manage all the family units like dad, virtual sister and virtual brothers. Becoming mother is not an easy thing when you play real pregnancy simulator. Giving birth to a child is the most extreme painful thing in this world of virtual mom games. This real mother simulator game allow you to interact with all the fun family members and help them as a mother in their daily life real problems.

Feeding an infant is a full time job of this happy family simulator of real virtual baby games. Real mom animations allow you to feed an infant with all the things he need to bring up his life in real fun games. Play as a protective mom and take care of children and husband a make a real virtual happy family in this life simulation games. Have virtual sister for babies and make them play with their brother to make the virtual brother and virtual sister bond strong.
